Thy People Shall be My People by Betty Girling

Alice Paul
If I Owned a Car That Special I'd Work on it Every Day
What Do You Do When Your Parents Do Something Wrong - Like Lie?
Do People Ever Learn to Handle Death So it Doesn't Hurt So Bad?
Is It Wrong For a Girl to Worry About Ever Having a Baby?
I Had a Very Good Friend Who Lied About Me. I Feel Terrible. What Should I Do?
My Mother Worries About Me All the Time. She Doesn't Want me to do Anything the Other Kids my Age Do.
My Aunt Lives with Us and She Drinks More Than My Parents Think
When you Get Mad At Yourself... Is That Harder to Learn How to Handle?
What If Nobody Loves Me When I Grow Up?
It is Lonesome Being the Most Different Kid in Class
If Your Self Image is so Important Why Don't Your Parents and Teachers and Everbody Help You Keep Yours in Shape?
They Talk About How Tought it is Being An Only Child. It's Lots Worser Being an Only Parent.
People Need to Be Told They Are Loved. How Do You Tell Your Parents to Tell You?
When You Know Somebody Else is Cheating, Why Shouldn't You?
One of My Good Friends Whom I Like Very Much Keeps Stealing Little Stuff from Dug Stores or the Kid's Lockers at School. I Can't Persuade Him it's Wrong.
My Sister Gets By With a Lot
My Friend's Farther was Killed in a Car Accident. Now I Worry Everytime my Parents Go Anywhere in our Car.
Is It True That People Judge You By the Kind of Friends You Have?
What is the Healthy "Appropriate" Thing to Do When You're So Mad You Feel You'll Burst? There are Some People you Just want to Smash Sometimes
Everybody Has a Lot of Diferent Feelings That Gallop Off Like Ponies In Different Directions. How Do You Handle Feelings Like That? How About Helping Friends Who Are Working Out Thier Feelings.
Can Thinking About Death Before it Happens Help You When it Does?
Is It Wrong for a Girl to Never Want to Get Married?
Is The Worst "Lonely" When Somebody You Love Dies?
Sometimes When You Feel Real Happy it Comes out in Giggling. Giggling is Something Big People Are Always Telling you to Stop. Why? Is it Because They Aren't Happy - So They're Jealous?
Worrying May be a Silly Waste of Time, but Carrying a Rain Coat Can Be Very Wise Sometimes. It's Smart to be Careful, Right?
Sometimes When You Need Love Badly Is it Okay to Turn to Grandparents, Uncles, Auntts, Grown-Up Friends... Even Pets?
Sometimes I'm Able to Handle Some Feelings Okay but I Can't Handle Others. Then My "Self image" Makes Me Feel Like a Little Kid Again
Some Families Hug a Lot; Others Don't. Is Touching a Good Thing in Families?

The Man Next Door Died in an Automobile Accident Last Year. Just Before he Left the House That Day, One of His Kids Sassed Him. That Kid is my Friends and Now he Feels Terrible Because He'll Never be Able to Say He's Sorry. Is There Any Way I can Help ...
FOr the Last Couple of Years There've Been Months When I Don't Do Anything Right... Am I Just Lazy Like My Family Says?
Is Anger Almost the Commonest Feeling There Is?
I Don't Know if It's A "Happening" or Not...
They're Talking About "Battered Children" in the Newspapers
In a Family It's Lousey When It's Never Your Turn
Do you Have to Go to Church to Learn That Some Things Are Wrong... Nothing Would be Safe. How Can We Make Her Stop?
Isn't Everybody Being Willing and Able to Change the Big Clue in Making a Family Really Work?
Sometimes its Hard to Tell When a Person is Really a Friend. A Guy I Liked a Lot Got Me Into a Heap of Trouble Last Year.
Most People Our Age Who THink at all Know That Someday Somebody We Love is Going to Die. It Happens to Everbody. No Matter When it Happens, It's Awfully Hard on the Person Who's Left
My Folks Have Always Been Tough About Us Never Speaking to Strangers... You'll Never Guess What They Did! They Sat us Down and Talked Straight!
I Get Very Angry When Someone Bad Mouths My Family or My People. Is That Natural?
Does Anger Do Much Damage Inside a Person?
My Family Moves a lot Because of my Father's Work. I Don't Try to Make Friends Anymore.
When My Grandmother Died My Mother Cried a Lot
In My Neighborhood Only One Guy's Got a Regular Family... He Claims It's a Crazy Neighborhood... Now We All Feel No Good.
I Worry About Everything - Like Getting Sick of Hurt of Dying
Doesn't Everybody Slip Back Into Baby Feelings Sometimes?
If It's Such a GReat Ida, Why Do So Many Families Break Up?
One of Our Neighbors Died... Dying
If You Think Maybe You're Mentally Sick... How Do You Know and Who Decides?
If People Really Love You, They Shouldn't Hurt You.
It Won't Be Easy For Dad or Us When He Gets Out of Prison
Do People Come in Familes for a Reason?
Wouldn't it be Better is Some Families Did Break up Instead of Always Fighting?
If We Have to Be Polite to Adults Why Aren't They Polite Back?
Does Everybody Start Out With the Same Feelings or Do We Get New Ones as We Grow Up?
My Family Fights. I Get So Embarrassed
Does It Hurt to be Dead?
Is it True I'm The Only One LIke Me?
I Worry About Death Hitting Kids I Know or my Pets
How Does a Person Keep His Mental Health If His Parents Do Get Divorced?
It's Not As Easy to Find Friends As it Used to be... We've Moved Six Times Since I Started School. It Makes a Difference
My Father is More Particular About My Friends Because I am a Girl Than He is About My Brothers. I Don't Think That's Fair.
Nobody Treats Me Like a Person
What Would I Like to Have? Poise! and Courage! And...
I Think the Words "Appropriate Behavior" are Tossed at Kids When Grown-ups Want us to Act Differently Than We Feel.
It Kills Me To Wait. Is It Impossible to be Born Without Patience?
There Are Lots of "Lonelies"... Like When Nobody Listens, or When You're Too Young or Too Old, or When You Have to Make a Hard Decision By Yourself, or When You're in Pain
Everybody Has So Many Wild and Difference Feelings, How Can You Keep Each of Them Behaving "Appropriately?"
My Father Has Been Transferred. We'll Go to a New School in the Fall, and Already I'm Scared
If You Try to Handle Your Feelings in a Health Way, Does That Mean That You're Usually Behaving "Appropriately"?
How Can You Build a Strong "Self-image" For Yourself and Still Keep Flexible Enough So you Don't Fall Apart When Something Unexpected Smashes You?
My Older Brother Slaps the Rest of Us Around. Is This a Phase? Or is He Sick?
How Do You Diffuse a Bomb?
I Can't Love My Stepfather as if He Were My Dad!
Can You Have More Than One Best Friend?
Friends Come in All Sizes and Ages and Sexes. Even Relatives Can Be Friends Sometimes
I Feel Like Nobody Wants Me Around
Should a Person Have One Best Friend or a Lot of Medium Friends?
I Know I'm Supposed to Have a "Self-Image," but I Don't Even Know What it is.
I Get So Afraid of People Who Are Angry
The Idea of a Family is Very Sensible Isn't It?
How Do You Make Yourself Into a Real Person
How Can Three Kids in One Family be so Different?
My Mother Lets Everybody Come To My House. But I Can Never Go To Anybody Else's House. What Is the Matter with Her?
My Brother Keeps Putting Me Down. It Makes Me Feel Awful.
My Brother Who is Just 16 is a Great Guy... Is He Mentally Sick?
Can Kids Do Anything to help So There Won't be a Divorce?
How Does a Person Our Age Learn to Behave "Appropriately" Always? Who Decides What's Appropriate?
I Have So Many Moods I Never Seem to Have Time to Sort Them out
We've Been Talking About "Happenings," What Can You Do So You Never Forget the Great Things... Ever?
It's Not.... Who get Divorced!
Is Happiness Different for Different People? Like Some People and Other People are Happy When They are Alone. Is There Any Best Way?
Babies Change So Fast and in So Many Ways
Every Family Gets Messed Up Sometimes. When That Happens Am I Ever Glad I've Got Friends.
What parts of our personality grow up fastest?
I Worry About My Parents Ever Getting Divorced. Is This a Normal Worry?
Even If You've Got a Family That Works Pretty Good... What If You're the One That Doesn't Work?
When Your Best Friends Moves Away, How Can You Bear It?
I'm Only Eleven But I've Fallen in Love With the Gym Teacher
Of All the Feelings There Are, Which are the Ones Which Give a Growing Up Person the Most Trouble?
Can Anything Be Done to Stop a Mother Who Protects You So Much You Feel Suffocated?
Does Anybody Ever Score 100% on Handling Their Feelings?
When Do Babies Stop and Persons Begin?
If You Haven't Got a Grandfather, Can You Adopt One?
There's One Thing Worse. That's Being Dumb Enough to Start Drinking Yourself.
Do Kids Who Go to Church Know More About Death Than We Do?
My Uncle Ed, My Dad's Brother is in Jail. Everytime I do Something Wrong, My Mother Says I'm Going to Be Just LIke Him, Don't you Inherit Things Equally?
Can Someone Fourteen Be An Alcoholic?
Is Happiness Just an Accident or Can You Really Build Your Life so You Really Are Happy Most of the Time?
I've Got a Friend in School Who Shows Off All the Time in Class. I Get Embarrassed What Can I Do?
My Parents Secret Weapons are Listening and Praise
What Do You Do When Someone in Your Real Close Family Dies?
Get in Trouble in School Two or Three Times and You Get Blames for Everything
How Come They Blame You for What You Inherited
Doesn't Anyone Think of The Kids When They Think of Divorce?
Having One Parent... Or Maybe Two... Who Are Alcoholics is About as Awful a Thing as can Happen to any Kid. You Can't Depend on Anything.
Who Is Really Responsible for How a Child Feels About Himself?
Do Kids Have Different Kinds of "Self Images" and "Appropriate Behavior" Than Grown Ups Do?
Are Your Feelings Born With You or do You Learn Feelings Like You Learn to Walk and Talk?
How Does Knowing You're Loved as a Baby Help You to Grow up to be a Child?
What Do We Get By Heredity
Every Once In A While I Explode and I Hate It
Sometimes When You're With Friends Somebody Says Somthing That Makes you Feel different... Like You Don't Match Them Anymore, and You Get Lonely
How Can You Tell People When They Hurt You By What They Say?
Should I Try and Make the World Happier for the People Around Me? Does This Include Your Family or is That Your Parent's Job?
I Never Seem To Have Friends Like The Other Kids Do. What Can I Do About It?
I'm Afraid of Pain. Does That Make me a Coward?
Can You Tell When Somebody Loves You?
What Can I Do So My Kids Will Inherit the Best
My Gramma and My Dog Are My Best Friends. Does That Make Me Strange?
Robert Samples
Does Everybody Feel Lonely Sometimes Even When Around People You Know?
One Thing That Happens an Awful Lot is You Get Mad and Say Things you Don't Mean to People you Love and Some of Them Never Forget It. I Don't Know What to Do About That.
Does Everybody's Appropriate Behavior Match?
I Don't LIke Some Things About My Family. Will I Be Like Them Anyway?
If a Baby Gets Angry When You're Taking Care of HIm What's the Best Thing to Do?
